#sidebar TOC

= urlinfo =

Information about an url.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || required || URL string for the target. ||

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/urlinfo.json?url=http://twitter.com/
}}}

This will fetch information about Twitter's homepage.
